data.title: Leadership Training
data.subtitle: February 2024
data.description: All the assigned new leaders of this year 2024 are going to have leadership training with our Senior pastor so that they will be equipped to lead their assigned department.

data.title: Preloved Clothes Selling
data.subtitle: March 2024
data.description: The youth department is holding an event on Sunday, March 3, 2024, after the service, where you can buy used and preloved clothes including dresses, skirts, hoodies, shirts, polos, pants, and many more.
